titleStmt.title: A sermon, preached at Kingston upon Hull: upon the day of thankes-giving after the battell, and that marvailous victory at Hessam-Moore, neare Yorke. / By J.W. B.D.
titleStmt.author: J. W. (Joshua Whitton)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Badger, for Matthew Walbank, and are to be sold at his shop at Grayes-Inne Gate,
